items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t have known this was going to happen.
Tom wanted Mary to write a recommendation for him.
Tom wanted to ask you some questions about French.
Tom wanted to hit Mary, but he controlled himself.
Tom wants Mary to buy a new dress for the banquet.
Tom and Mary announced their engagement yesterday.
I wouldn\'t want to be the one who has to do that.
When was the last time that you cleaned your room?
Would you be so kind as to answer a few questions?
I thought I heard Tom was going to move to Boston.
Everybody knows that Tom and Mary like each other.
Everyone in the room was stunned by what happened.
Everyone on the ship thought it was going to sink.
As soon as the bell rang, Tom headed for the door.
Tom did some work for our company a few years ago.
I probably shouldn\'t do anything like that today.
I should\'ve known Tom and Mary would be together.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d first met Mary.
Tom opened the book and flipped through the pages.
Tom and Mary said that they didn\'t want to fight.
